skills.name: Chill of Bone-Piercing Coagulation
skills.desc: Deals Ice DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Punishment of Endless Winter
skills.desc: Deals massive Ice DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Hoarfrost of Eternal Isolation
skills.desc: Deals minor Ice DMG to a single target, with a high chance to Freeze the target.

skills.name: Wrath of Winterland Saints
skills.desc: Enters the Charge state. The next action casts "Punishment of Endless Winter" on all targets.
